dcterms:creator: Matthijs TJ Spaan
Nikos Vlassis
dcterms:description: A collection of POMDPs from 11 different domains used to evaluate the effectiveness of the ATPO approach in assisting unknown teammates in solving unknown tasks.
dcterms:title: POMDPs from 11 domains

dcterms:creator: Matthijs TJ Spaan
Nikos Vlassis
dcterms:description: A standard multi-agent navigation problem where agents must reach static destination cells.
dcterms:title: Gridworld

dcterms:creator: Matthijs TJ Spaan
Nikos Vlassis
dcterms:description: A modified version of the original Pursuit domain where agents must capture a moving prey by surrounding it.
dcterms:title: Pursuit

dcterms:creator: Matthijs TJ Spaan
Nikos Vlassis
dcterms:description: Models a scenario where two agents must cooperate to secure an abandoned power plant with rooms that may contain toxic waste.
dcterms:title: Abandoned Power Plant

dcterms:creator: Francisco S Melo
Manuela Veloso
dcterms:description: Navigation tasks where two agents must reach two destinations in various map layouts.
dcterms:title: NTU, ISR, MIT, Pentagon, and CIT

dcterms:creator: M. Carroll
R. Shah
M. Ho
T. Griffiths
S. Seshia
P. Abbeel
A. Dragan
dcterms:description: Models a scenario where two agents must cooperate to cook soups, requiring coordination and task adaptation.
dcterms:title: Overcooked
